texts.es: Es una joven emprendedora, alegre, tiene 22 años de edad, madre soltera de dos menores de edad, vive en la pequeña comunidad de San Miguel en Tasba Pri-RAAN. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos desde hace 2 años se dedica de Lunes a Viernes a la producción de queso y crema, los que lleva a vender en el mercado municipal de Bilwi-Puerto Cabezas y entregar a clientes que ya la conocen y le hacen encargos. Es la primera vez que está solicitando un crédito  con el objetivo de incrementar la producción de queso y crema, comprando más leche, además necesita comprar moldes para hacer queso, una tina y una mesa para moldear; también quiere diversificar su actividad con la compra de cerdo para engorde y venderlos en el mercado, porque hay buena demanda de carne de cerdo. Sueña con ver su negocio más grande y con mejores condiciones; también quiere llegar a tener una pulpería en la que pueda ofrecer los principales productos que demanda la población.
texts.en:
She is an enterprising and happy young woman.  She is 22 years old, and she is the single mother of two minor children.  She lives in the small community of San Miguel in Tasba Pri-RAAN.  In order to have her own source of income, she has been producing cheese and cream on Mondays through Fridays for two years.  She takes these products to sell at the Bilwi-Puerto Cabezas municipal market.  She delivers them to customers who already know her and place orders with her.

This is the first time that she is requesting a loan.  She does so in order to increase the production of cheese and cream.  She will buy more milk.  She also needs to buy molds to make cheese, a tub, and a table to shape the cheese.  She also wants to diversify her business activity by purchasing pigs to fatten and latter sell at the market.  She wants to do this because there is a good demand for pork.

She dreams of seeing her business become bigger and with better conditions.  She also want to come to have a grocery store in which she is able to sell the main products that the population demands.

loans.use: to buy more milk, cheese molds, a tub, a table for molding cheese, and pigs to fatten and sell at the market.

loans.name: Samah

texts.en:
Samah is a 28-year-old divorced Palestinian refugee. She has been working in the field of women's accessories and special beauty needs since 2004. In 2014, she established her own business and she is working hard to develop it as much as she can, to make sure that she can support herself in a well-managed way, and prove that she can be a successful business woman.

Samah is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to develop her business through buying a special laser hair removal machine, in addition to a special facial cleaning machine that will improve her business services and attract new customers. Samah is very anxious about this loan and is working hard to make sure that her business development will spread beauty among almost every woman in her region. She will also work hard on developing the retail accessories side of her business more.

loans.use: To buy a special laser hair removal machine, and a special facial cleaning machine

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina lives in Yenoqavan village with her husband, mother-in-law, and four children (ages 16, 15,13, and 10 years old).

Irina and her husband run a farm. Her mother-in-law helps to take care of the children and Irina and her husband run their small farm. It includes pigs, piglets, and chickens. Some years ago, Irina and her husband also bought arable land where they currently cultivate corn, potatoes, and grass. The grass is used as forage for the livestock. 

Irina has now applied for this loan to purchase agro-machinery (tractor) and to develop the cultivation process. The loan will give them an opportunity to increase the cultivation process and gather a good harvest.

Since this is Irina's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products in the past because they had no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for agro-machinery (tractor).

loans.name: Carlos Ismael

texts.es: Carlos de 50 años de edad se dedica desde hace 20 años a la crianza de ganado de engorde, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive con su esposa en casa propia, Carlos esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ganado de repasto para poder seguir con su trabajo y así darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Carlos, who's fifty years old, has been raising feeder cattle for twenty years. He sells his cattle at several markets that are located near his place of residence. With his earnings, he manages to cover some of the household expenses. He lives with his wife in their own home. Carlos is applying for this loan to buy livestock to continue working and thus provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar-charging set, and a weighing scale.

loans.name: Juana Clorinda

texts.es: Es una mujer activa, es líder en su comunidad, tiene 58 años de edad, madre soltera de 2 hijos que ya han conformado su propia familia. –tiene más de 20 años de experiencia de trabajos de agricultura y ganadería a nivel familiar. Ha participado en diversas capacitaciones, enfocadas en el manejo integral de los cultivos, abonos orgánicos, motivación y organización, mejoramiento de vida que han impartido organismos de cooperación y ONG´s como PANA PANA, quien le otorgó certificación como promotora agropecuaria.  Actualmente, produce hortalizas, granos básicos y se dedica al engorde ganado. El crédito que ella está solicitando es para la siembra de frijol y maíz, cubrir las necesidades de insumos agrícolas, mano de obra y manejo agronómico de estos cultivos. Este financiamiento le va permitir  incrementar el área de producción de frijoles y maíz. Su sueño es contar con un buen corral para proteger el ganado y diversificar su producción.
texts.en:
She is an active woman and a leader in her community.  She is 58 years old and the single mother of two children, who now have their own families.  She has over 20 years of experience working in agriculture and with livestock at the family level.  

She has participated in diverse trainings that focus on the integral management of the crops, organic fertilizers, motivation and organization.  Life improvement has occurred because of cooperating organizations and ‘ONG’s’ [NGO’s] like Pana Pana.  She received her certification as an agricultural developer from Pana Pana.   

She currently produces vegetables and basic grains, and she fattens livestock.  The loan that she is requesting is to plant beans and corn, to cover the needed agricultural supplies, and to pay for labor and maintenance of these crops.

This loan will allow her to increase the production area of beans and corn.  Her dream is to have a good corral to protect the livestock and to diversify her production.

loans.use: to plant beans and corn, to cover the needed agricultural supplies, and to pay for labor and maintenance of these crops.

loans.name: Surrya

texts.en: Surrya, aged 47, is a married woman.  She deals in the business of animal sales. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate some extra income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase two more calves. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase two more calves.
